plot outline: An indolent guy lambodara who always relied on astrological beliefs rather than effort ends up going to London leaving behind his family and his childhood love Rashmi. In London he faces lots of challenges and hurdles and everything he ever believed in is put to test.
title: Londonalli Lambodhara
plot: An indolent guy who relies on astrology rather than effort leaves behind his family and his childhood love to move to London.

An indolent guy lambodara who always relied on astrological beliefs rather than effort ends up going to London leaving behind his family and his childhood love Rashmi. In London he faces lots of challenges and hurdles and everything he ever believed in is put to test.::Raj Surya
